title: Why Is The FBI Doing This? (Ep 1855)
description:
In this episode, I address the shocking revelations by an FBI whistleblower about the efforts to target Trump supporters. 

News Picks:

More Illegals Are Heading to Martha's Vineyard Soon.

A whistleblower has some more information about FBI malfeasance.


Second looks: Peer-reviewed research questions mask study, finds hydroxychloroquine benefit.


Twitter reactions to New York Times saying DeSantis is meaner than Trump.

Unexpectedly, the USAF Finds Itself With a Critical Shortage of Pilots While It Says It Has Too Many White Officers.

Pro-Free Speech YouTube Competitor "Rumble" Completes Merger to Go Public.

More teachers are getting fired for resisting vaccine mandates.
